00070 /*******************************************************************************
00071 **                       Macro Definitions                                    **

00074 
00078 #define SDMMC004_CEILING_PRIORITY                 (1)
00079 #define SDMMC004_SEMAPHORE_BLK_TIME              (50000 )
00080 
00085 #define SDMMC004_NORMAL_INT_STATUS_ENABLE                     (0x00F3U)
00086 #define SDMMC004_ERROR_INT_STATUS_ENABLE                      (0xE0FFU)
00087 
00088 #define SDMMC004_NORMAL_INT_STATUS_BITS                       (0x7fffU)
00089 /* Command line Interrupt errors status bitmask    */
00090 #define SDMMC004_ERROR_CMD_STATUS_BITMASK                     (0x000FU)
00091 /* Data line Error status  bitmask      */
00092 #define SDMMC004_ERROR_DATA_STATUS_BITMASK                    (0x0070U)
00093 
00094 /*All Data lines High Status Value in Present State Register */
00095 #define SDMMC004_ALL_DATA_LINES_HIGH                      (0xFU)
00096 /* Error Interrupt Status Bitmask         */
00097 #define SDMMC004_ALL_ERROR_STATUS_BITMASK                 (0xFFFFU)
00098 
00099 
00100 /* All Normal Interrupt Signal Enable & Error Int Signal Enable bit fields
00101  * except Block Gap Event, DMA Int, Card Interrupt, ADMA Error, Vendor specific
00102  */
00103 /* Enable this macro if card detection feature available */
00104 #if SDMMC_CARD_DETECTION_SUPPORT
00105 #define SDMMC004_NORMAL_INT_SIGNAL_ENABLE                     (0x00F3U)
00106 #else
00107 #define SDMMC004_NORMAL_INT_SIGNAL_ENABLE                     (0x0033U)
00108 #endif
00109 #define SDMMC004_ERROR_INT_SIGNAL_ENABLE                      (0xE0FFU)
00110 
00111 
00112 
00113 /* SDCLK frequency Select value in ClockControl Register */
00114 #define SDMMC004_CTRL_SDCLK_FREQ_SEL_VALUE                   (0x1U)
00115 
00116 /* Data Timeout counter value in Timeout Control Register */
00117 #define SDMMC004_CTRL_DAT_TIMEOUT_CNT_VAL_VALUE               (0xeU)
00118 
00119 /* SD Bus Voltage value in Power Control Register */
00120 #define SDMMC004_CTRL_SD_BUS_VOLTAGE_SEL_VALUE                (0x07U)
00121 
00122 
00123 /* Switch function bitmask */
00124 #define SDMMC004_SWITCH_FUNC_GRP1_STATUS_BITMASK           (0x0000000FU)
00125 #define SDMMC004_SWITCH_FUNC_GRP1_STATUS_BITPOS            (0x0U)
00126 
00127 /* Transfer Block Register */
00128 #define SDMMC004_TX_BLOCK_SIZE_VALUE                       (0x0200U)
00129 
00130 /* Card's OCR register  */
00131 #define SDMMC004_OCR_POWER_STATUS_BITMASK                  (0x80000000U)
00132 #define SDMMC004_OCR_CCS_BITMASK                           (0x40000000U)
00133 #define SDMMC004_MMC_OCR_ACCESS_MODE_BITMASK               (0x60000000U)
00134 #define SDMMC004_MMC_OCR_ACCESS_MODE_BITPOS                (0x1DU)
00135 
00136 /* Response Register */
00137 #define SDMMC004_HC_RESPONSE1_BITPOS                       (0x10U)
00138 
00139 /*  SD Card's CMD8 response R7 bit positions */
00140 #define SDMMC004_SD_CMD8_CHECK_PATTERN_VALUE               (0xAAU)
00141 #define SDMMC004_SD_CMD8_CHECK_PATTERN_BITMASK             (0xFFU)
00142 #define SDMMC004_SD_CMD8_CHECK_PATTERN_BITPOS              (0x00U)
00143 #define SDMMC004_SD_CMD8_VHS_BITPOS                        (0x8U)
00144 #define SDMMC004_SD_CMD8_VHS_BITMASK                       (0xFU)
00145 #define SDMMC004_SD_VHS_PATTERN_2_7_3_6_VALUE              (0x1U)
00146 
00147 /* RCA Register */
00148 #define SDMMC004_MMC_DEFAULT_RCA                           (0x0001U)
00149 #define SDMMC004_ARG_RCA_BITPOS                            (0x10U)
00150 
00151 /* SD Status */
00152 #define SDMMC004_SD_CARD_TYPE_BITMASK                      (0xFFFFU)
00153 
00154 /* SCR Register Bitmask */
00155 #define SDMMC004_SCR_BUS_WIDTH4_BITMASK                    (0x4U)
00156 
00157 /* Start of Card Status Register i.e CSR Error Bits Bitmask */
00158 #define SDMMC004_CSR_OUT_OF_RANGE_BITMASK                  (0x80000000U)
00159 #define SDMMC004_CSR_ADDRESS_ERROR_BITMASK                 (0x40000000U)
00160 #define SDMMC004_CSR_BLOCK_LEN_ERROR_BITMASK               (0x20000000U)
00161 #define SDMMC004_CSR_ERASE_SEQ_ERROR_BITMASK               (0x10000000U)
00162 #define SDMMC004_CSR_ERASE_PARAM_BITMASK                   (0x08000000U)
00163 #define SDMMC004_CSR_WP_VIOLATION_BITMASK                  (0x04000000U)
00164 #define SDMMC004_CSR_LOCK_UNLOCK_FAILED_BITMASK            (0x01000000U)
00165 #define SDMMC004_CSR_COM_CRC_ERROR_BITMASK                 (0x00800000U)
00166 #define SDMMC004_CSR_ILLEGAL_COMMAND_BITMASK               (0x00400000U)
00167 #define SDMMC004_CSR_CARD_ECC_FAILED_BITMASK               (0x00200000U)
00168 #define SDMMC004_CSR_CC_ERROR_BITMASK                      (0x00100000U)
00169 #define SDMMC004_CSR_ERROR_BITMASK                         (0x00080000U)
00170 #define SDMMC004_CSR_CSD_OVERWRITE_BITMASK                 (0x00010000U)
00171 #define SDMMC004_CSR_WP_ERASE_SKIP_BITMASK                 (0x00008000U)
00172 #define SDMMC004_SWITCH_ERROR_BITMASK                      (0x00000080U)
00173 #define SDMMC004_CSR_ASK_SEQ_ERROR_BITMASK                 (0x00000008U)
00174 #define SDMMC004_CSR_CARD_IS_LOCKED_BITMASK                (0x02000000U)
00175 #define SDMMC004_CSR_CURRENT_STATE_BITMASK                 (0x00001D00U)
00176 #define SDMMC004_CSR_CURRENT_STATE_BITPOS                  (0x9U)
00177 #define SDMMC004_CSR_CURRENT_STATE_TRANS_VALUE             (0x4U)
00178 #define SDMMC004_CSR_CARD_IS_LOCKED_BITMASK                (0x02000000U)
00179 /* End of Card Status Register i.e CSR Error Bits */
00180 
00181 
00182 /* Some Command's static Arguments */
00183 #define SDMMC004_ARGUMENT0                                 (0x00000000U)
00184 #define SDMMC004_SD_CMD8_ARG                               (0x000001AAU)
00185 #define SDMMC004_SD_ACMD41_F80_ARG                         (0x00100000U)
00186 #define SDMMC004_SD_ACMD41_F81_ARG                         (0x40100000U)
00187 #define SDMMC004_MMC_CMD1_ARG                              (0x40FF8000U)
00188 #define SDMMC004_MMC_4BUS_WIDTH_ARG                        (0x03B70100U)
00189 #define SDMMC004_SD_4BUS_WIDTH_ARG                         (0x00000002U)
00190 #define SDMMC004_MMC_HIGH_SPEED_ARG                        (0x03B90100U)
00191 #define SDMMC004_SD_HIGH_SPEED_ARG                         (0x80000001U)
00192 
00196 #define SDMMC004_CARD_POWER_DELAY                                   20
00197 #define SDMMC004_DELAY_IN_TRANSFER                                1000
00198 #define SDMMC004_RESET_In_DATA_TRANSFER                           1000
00199 #define SDMMC004_DELAY_IN_COMMAND                                 1000
00200 #define SDMMC004_RESET_DELAY                                       500
00201 #define SDMMC004_CLOCK_STABLE_DELAY                               1000
00202 
00203 /*******************************************************************************
00204 **                      Private Type Definitions                              **
00205 *******************************************************************************/
00206 /* This macro is is used to  enable the signal bits in
00207  * Normal Signal Enable register*/
00208 #define SDMMC004_ENABLE_INT_SIGNAL(Mask)\
00209 { \
00210   (SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL &= ~Mask ); \
00211   (SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL |= Mask ); \
00212 }
00213 /* This macro is is used to  disable the signal bits in
00214  * Normal Signal Enable register*/
00215 #define SDMMC004_DISABLE_INT_SIGNAL(Mask)  (SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL &= ~Mask)
00216 
00217 /* Number of Reset retries during card initializaion */
00218 #define SDMMC004_NUM_CARD_RESET_RETRIES     2
00219 /* Block Size in bytes */
00220 #define SDMMC004_BLOCK_SIZE                 512
00221 /* Block size in quad bytes.  */
00222 #define SDMMC004_NUM_QUADLETS_IN_BLOCK      SDMMC004_BLOCK_SIZE >> 2
00223 
00224 
00225 /*******************************************************************************

00231 typedef struct SDMMC004_CommandType
00232 {
00240    uint16_t ResponseTypeSelect : 2;
00241 
00245    uint16_t  Rsvd1 : 1;
00246 
00252   uint16_t CrcCheckEnable : 1;
00259   uint16_t IndexCheckEnable : 1 ;
00264   uint16_t DataPresentSelect : 1 ;
00269   uint16_t CommandType : 2;
00274   uint16_t CommandIndex : 6 ;
00278   uint16_t  Rsvd2 : 2;
00279 } SDMMC004_CommandType;
00280 
00284 typedef struct SDMMC004_CardInfoType
00285 {
00289   uint32_t Ocr;
00293   uint32_t CidArray[4];
00297   uint32_t CsdArray[4];
00301   SDMMC004_SCRType Scr;
00305   uint16_t Rca;
00306 } SDMMC004_CardInfoType;
00307 
00311 typedef struct SDMMC004_InterruptContext
00312 {
00314   uint16_t InterruptStatusShadow;
00316   uint8_t CmdFlag;
00318   uint8_t DataFlag;
00320   uint8_t TransferFlag;
00321 } SDMMC004_InterruptContext;
